Instance Method# lookAroundViewer(isPresented:scene:allowsNavigation:showsRoadLabels:pointsOfInterest:onDismiss:)

MapKitSwiftUIiOS 17.0+iPadOS 17.0+

```
@MainActor @preconcurrency
func lookAroundViewer(
    isPresented: Binding<Bool>,
    scene: Binding<MKLookAroundScene?>,
    allowsNavigation: Bool = true,
    showsRoadLabels: Bool = true,
    pointsOfInterest: PointOfInterestCategories = .all,
    onDismiss: (() -> Void)? = nil
) -> some View

```
